wordGroup: perceptual experience 知觉经验；感性经验

sentences.en: Some children have more finely trained perceptual skills than others.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子比其他孩子具备更为训练有素的感知技能。

sentences.en: Moreover, these perceptual changes can be profound and durable.
sentences.cn: 此外，这些感知变化可能是深刻和持久的。

sentences.en: However, these measures are only "indirect" indicators of the infant's perceptual abilities.
sentences.cn: 然而，这些测量也仅是婴儿感知能力的“间接”指标。
